alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Southern Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 4:32AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Fairfield and southwestern Lancaster Counties through 500 AM EDT... At 431 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Winnsboro, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fishing Creek Reservoir around 500 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Bell Town Fire Station, Mitford, Kirk Air Base, Faith Christian School, Fairfield County Detention Center, Fairfield Elementary School, Pleasant Hill, Lancaster Mill, White Oak and McWhirter Airfield. This includes Interstate 77 between mile markers 40 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
